title: 突然发现回复的一个特性
author: 草..
txt_content:
额，好像是刚才卡卡死才会这样
我按Ctrl+Enter
然后显示
This XML file does not appear to have any style information associated with it. The document tree is shown below.

<root>
<![CDATA[
抱歉，您的帖子小于 10 个字符的限制<script type="text/javascript" reload="1">if(typeof errorhandle_vfastpost=='function') {errorhandle_vfastpost('抱歉，您的帖子小于 10 个字符的限制', {'minpostsize':'10','maxpostsize':'1000000'});}</script>
]]>



</root>

replies.author: 2002bluesky
replies.txt_content: 不就是把document tree给你看了一下吗
